lender.name: toursmachu picchu
lender.loan_because: Tours Machu picchu was connected with Cusco, the capital city, and others through an excellent trails network. The Inca trail to Machu Picchu is considered as the most famous trekking route in South America, due to the different elements that offers to the visitor. It begins at the Km 82 of the railway, towards La Convencion Valley.
lender.occupational_info: The natural scenery is impressive, with a remarkable balance between nature and the Inca architectonic work. The presence of the Vilcabamba mountain range (with snow-capped peaks 6.000mts. height and over, such as the Salkantay and Humantay, among others) along with spectacular forests and valleys, create fantasy images where dawns and dusks provide spectacles of greatness and mystery.

lender.name: THE World F.S.F. Funding
lender.loan_because: to make a difference

lender.name: Jane
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: May

lender.occupational_info: I am a Chef by training but wear many hats in trying to provide our guests with a memorable experience and an excellent meal.

lender.name: Terry
lender.loan_because: I want to share my good fortune in life.
lender.occupational_info: I work for my state government, in programs that protect water quality in streams, lakes, and wetlands.

lender.name: Daniel

lender.name: Peter

lender.occupational_info: I do what I can to get by, but I really enjoy playing drums.

lender.name: Faye
lender.loan_because: My daughter introduced me to this wonderful opportunity as a Mother's Day gift in 2009. It is the best gift I've ever received.

lender.name: Nestor Family
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people better themselves through hard work.
lender.occupational_info: I teach science and math to students ages 5-12 in Denver at a public school.

lender.name: Jaime
lender.occupational_info: I live in Spain, but I go to college in United States were I run for DRURY University.

lender.name: Elizabeth

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: Everybody needs help once in awhile.
lender.occupational_info: I coordinate completion of projects. My projects are building networks for companies.

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: I believe in supporting women we are supporting communities to become sustainable. Lending is respectful because it creates independence and accountability, rather than dependence and vulnerablity.
lender.occupational_info: I have worked in community development in local government for many years. I am now consulting to the not for profit sector and local government in leadership, strategy and governance. I am also a Board member of the Australian Committee of the United Nations Development Fund for Women (UNIFEM). I am passionate about empowering women to make positive change.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: microcredit, when used effectively, is an empowering and sustainable development tool. I was fortunate enough to help set up a microcredit programme in Sierra Leone and the experience taught me a lot about the benefits of providing financial services to the poor.

lender.name: Janice and Trisha
lender.loan_because: It is so much fun to think about these people's lives getting better every day.
lender.occupational_info: My work is to raise my children,Trisha and Katie, to be wonderful happy people and to be that myself as well!

lender.name: Bryan
lender.loan_because: "For in truth it is life that gives unto life -- while you, who deem yourself a giver, are but a witness." Kahlil Gibran
lender.occupational_info: I assist the management of water resources in Texas and design drainage systems to help prevent flooding.

lender.name: Brandon

lender.occupational_info: I am applying to medical school in hopes of some day earning a medical degree so that I may heal and help others.

lender.occupational_info: untuk menjadi lebih baik.. . satu titik emosi tentang semua rintihan duniawi yg di alami atau pun harapan yg terbentur keraguan.. . . TUHAN jika benar do'a KU,kau dengar,maka ampuni aku tentang kesahKU,. dan biLa benar ke imanan KU tak mampu,gapai SURGA mu,maka izinkanlah orang2 yg ku sayangi berpijak di surga MU. TUHAN aku adalah hamba MU yg tersesat di satu emosi tentang rintihan duniawi akan harapan yg terbentur keraguan., seperti mLm ini..suasana hati tak bermakna,hanya sendu meraja di ruang hati,seperti bintang yg bersinar di keLamnya Pagi ini,tak ada kata yg bisa ku rangkai,tak ada warna yg bisa ku lukiskan,tak ada nada yg bisa ku teriakan,untuk satu keadaan hati yg suLit ku mengerti.. |-_-| 'confUsed'

lender.name: Rui
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserve to be able to live well, and with minimum conditions. Because everyone deserve to fulfill there dreams. lender.occupational_info:
As a student, I'm learning and we all need it, but I'm also not able to help those that I really want around the world. I think I'm not able to accomplish my dreams..the ones of a Peaceful and Happy world! Also, I would love to meet new people around the world.
But the time will come :)

lender.name: Martin
lender.loan_because: I want to support people to succeed.

I believe it is the responsibility of the people to reach out and share our bounties with each other.

lender.name: Church Family
lender.loan_because: This is an amazing new way to give to charity.

lender.name: Elaine
lender.loan_because: "For Christ's love compels us, because we are convinced that one died for all...that those who live should no longer live for themselves but for him who died for them and was raised again."
lender.occupational_info: I teach Americans how to relate to and share the love of Christ with people of other cultures in our community and all across the world.

lender.name: Joseph
lender.loan_because: I feel that we should make every attempt to provide resources to those that are attempting to make a better life for their family and community..

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I want to help others directly.
lender.occupational_info: I worked in local government information technology.

lender.name: Chelsea
lender.loan_because: I can pay it forward. I might be needful of help one day and I hope it will be given.
lender.occupational_info: I teach Suzuki philosophy violin and try to develop nobility and self-discipline in the children and families I work with. I'd like my students to be people who are capable of actioning change in the world.

lender.name: Amy

lender.name: Jutta
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in other people's life!
lender.occupational_info: What work? Luckily I am retired and sailing up and down the Queensland Coast!

lender.name: Maxwell
lender.loan_because: It seems like a meaningful, yet simple way to directly help people who not only need money but will sincerely use it to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I shoot lasers at brain cells.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I'd like to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: Appreciative of the rich life I have in NM

lender.name: Sharon & Matthew
lender.loan_because: Although we watch every dollar we earn and spend, we are still so much better off than a lot of the world. We have the ability to gain car & house loans easily, so would like to give others the opportunity to gain loans as well. It's only fair. We can't wait to lend for our next loan.
lender.occupational_info: Sharon works for a house builder solving problems with local Councils and helping clients. Matthew welds frames for commercial air conditioning systems.

lender.name: Lucy
lender.loan_because: I believe with a small loan that I invest today can make a big difference to others. My wish is to be a part of the organization to fight poverty, to keep hard-working individuals hope alive and their dreams come true. Id like to thank Kiva for their tremendous contribution toward helping people around the world, especially those of developing countries. I wish you well! Keep up the good work.

lender.loan_because: I want to help women who want to help themselves. (click the CONTACT US tab on my website to find my email address... feel free to contact me)

lender.loan_because:
We ourselves feel that what we are doing is just a drop in the ocean. But the ocean would be less because of that missing drop.

lender.name: Pam
lender.loan_because: "from those who have much....... to those who have little"

lender.name: Kathryn
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can. I would like to teach other woman around the world that confidence in oneself doesn't come from always being right but from never fearing being wrong.
lender.occupational_info:
The first priority in my life are my children. It's a job that will always be in demand, always challenging, and provides endless rewards.
My second job is I'm a journalist. As a journalist it is my job not to scare you but arm you with information. Information that you can use to help you make informed decisions to protect your family and property.

lender.name: Kay
lender.loan_because: I am infinitely blessed and want to pass along the blessings.

lender.occupational_info: I am a full-time mother and wife.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I can make a huge difference to others by doing something so small. If we all did the same, how much better would our world be?

lender.name: Chrissy Breakie

lender.occupational_info: I study chemistry, and I hope to use my chemistry to make the world a better place.

lender.name: Debra
lender.loan_because: its a logical system that works. It is easy for both lender and borrower. Its the right thing to do.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: I want to help others to be self-sufficient and because my faith tells me that we should share with others less fortunate than we are.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired high school English teacher, but I still work part time teaching at a community college.

lender.occupational_info: I assist by giving the little that I have in my pockets to someone who has nothing. The idea that an amount like $25 combined with other giver can change someone's life is such a God concept of living. The more we can do - the better the world.

lender.name: The Coles
lender.loan_because: it feels good to do our small part in making the world a better place.

lender.name: Casey
lender.loan_because: I
